channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25708|2024-08-03T04:49:42.664Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in WLAN due to buffer copy without checking size of input while parsing keys in Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-22096|2024-08-03T03:00:55.210Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption in Bluetooth HOST due to stack-based buffer overflow when when extracting data using command length parameter in Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-25693|2024-08-03T04:42:50.665Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
